Part 1 : ( single-dose ) subject receive 0.3 % 1 % GSK1940029 ( match vehicle ) , single approximately ( App ) 24 hour ( h ) ( 22.5h ) application surface area 400 square centimeter ( cm^2 ) ( 0.3 % ) , 400 cm^2 ( 1 % ) 1200 cm^2 ( 1 % ) , respectively , three sequential cohort . Part 2 : ( repeat-dose ) subject receive 0.3 % 1 % GSK1940029 ( match vehicle ) , 14 daily App24h ( 22.5h ) application surface area 400 cm^2 ( 0.3 % ) , 400 cm^2 ( 1 % ) 1200 cm^2 ( 1 % ) , respectively , three sequential cohort .
